name: Unconventional Weapons GDHQ Game Jam
description:
The game includes some weapon ideas made using the Filebase plugin made by GHDQ.
The weapons are in this order:
1. A pepper shaker minigun that shoots paper pins
2. An exploding cake
3. A submachine gun that shoots mini Toilet Paper rolls
4. A trash gun that shoots... well, Trash (It was meant to be a raccoon launcher)
5. A 5-star mop crossbow
